name: Multiarray-iso-proposal
tagline: Proposal for ISO C++ to modify std::array for extent counts besides one
body:
### About this Proposal
This proposal extends `std::array` from taking one extent for being built around a single-dimension array to arbitrary extents to encapsulate multi-dimensional arrays.  The extent list is implemented with the variadic template feature introduced in C++ 2011.

###Discussion

1. [Initial discussion](https://groups.google.com/a/isocpp.org/d/topic/std-proposals/s17-s_LXLT8/discussion) of this proposal in early September 2013
2. [A second round of discussion](https://groups.google.com/a/isocpp.org/d/topic/std-proposals/OMsTJWnCqKA/discussion) of this proposal in early October 2013

These discussions were in the [Google Group for ISO C++ Future Proposals](https://groups.google.com/a/isocpp.org/forum/?fromgroups#!forum/std-proposals) forum.

###Proposals

1. [N3794](http://www.open-std.org/jtc1/sc22/wg21/docs/papers/2013/n3794.html), the proposal after those first two rounds of discussion

You can find drafts, plus references, in the corresponding repository for this site (in the "master" branch).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
